Package com.oracle.coherence.spring.event.mapevent

Map Event Support.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedMapListener<K,​V>
    MapListener implementation that dispatches MapEvents to CoherenceEventListener annotated methods.
    MapListenerRegistrationBean
    CoherenceEventListener responsible for the registration of MapListeners.
    MethodMapListener<K,​V>
    A BaseMethodObserver that wraps a map listener Method.
    SimpleMapListener<K,​V>
    MapListener implementation that dispatches MapEvents to CoherenceEventListener annotated methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MapEventType
    Event type enumeration.
